subject: Re: amys back
author: William Murphy
full_text:

Hello Frank, those who are advancing the study of EVP's will likely always face the critics and doubters. Imagine what Tesla, Edison, Ford, the Wright brothers, and all the pioneers and early adopters have had to deal with. 
   
  Vicki, it's been nice reading your post. I am still absorbing all the presentations including yours I heard at the AA-EVP Conference in Atlanta. I was your lunch time pal, Bill Murphy. 

--0-642936374-1154846612=:43342
